select u.id, uf.name,c.company_name companyName,p.position,uf.Internship_status InternshipStatus from user u left join user_info uf on u.id=uf.id left join company_and_student cs on cs.student_id=u.id left join position p on cs.position_id=p.id left join company c on c.id=p.company_id
and uf.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and u.teacher_id=#{teacherId} and cs.is_accept=1
